meanings.definition: To tell again or in a different way.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys retelling her favorite stories to her friends.
meanings.sent2: He is retelling the events of the day to his family.
meanings.sent3: The children were retelling the story with funny voices.
meanings.sent4: Her retelling of the incident painted a vivid picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's retelling of history made it come alive for the students.

meanings.definition: A new or different version of a story or event.
meanings.sent1: The book is a retelling of a classic fairy tale.
meanings.sent2: The movie offers a modern retelling of the ancient legend.
meanings.sent3: The play was a humorous retelling of a famous historical event.
meanings.sent4: His retelling of the story added a fresh perspective to the original.
meanings.sent5: The artist's retelling of the myth was both creative and captivating.
